title: Meta Launches LlamaFirewall Framework to Stop AI Jailbreaks, Injections, and Insecure Code
description: Meta on Tuesday announced LlamaFirewall, an open-source framework designed to secure artificial intelligence (AI) systems against emerging cyber risks such as prompt injection, jailbreaks, and insecure code, among others.
